short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share files Anonymously with your friends and colleagues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share PDFs that you don't want people to save, share, or view more than once! Use FRIZB to send large files quickly directly from your browser, and more. Sharing files just got a whole lot easier with FRIZB. Now you can send files of any size to anyone without having to worry about confidential issues and privacy. FRIZB lets you share PDFs discreetly, preventing the viewer from saving or sharing the documents that you sent them and only allowing them to view it once. 

With the FRIZB Chrome extension, you can share files directly from your browser. No more worrying about emailing large files or visiting websites and waiting way to long for files to upload. Everything is done from your browser, allowing you to keep on browsing and working while FRIZB uploads your files, shares them with the recipient, and protects your privacy in the process.

Frizb extension changes your Chrome Homepage, New Tab and Default Search to http://info.trovi.com/About
